posts.post_content:
These common T206 cards speak for themselves I believe.  The Schreck has damage through this face that also affects reverse as you can see.  Seymour appears to have once been attached in scrapbook.  

Schreck $15
McGinley $17 
Davis $17
Seymour $15
Anderson $20

Prices are paypal friend.  If you don't like the price let me know.  I'm willing to deal!  Shipping is free!

Thanks, Michael
Michael, I'll take the Davis. PM coming.
All cards sold pending payment.  Thank you!
